name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Synclify - Watch in sync with your friends

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create a watch party straight from your browser â€” works anywhere, ad-free.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Watch ANY video streaming content in sync with friends straight from your browser.
Synclify is a browser extension for watching videos, films or any video content remotely with your friends, e.g., for movie nights with that long-distance special someone. It synchronizes video playback and volume, just share a room code!

This project is completely ad-free and open-source. You can sponsor this project here: https://github.com/sponsors/synclify

The extension is still in alpha so expect for something to now work and frequent updates. Send any bug or feedback here: 
https://github.com/synclify/Synclify/issues or send an email at info@synclify.party

Changelog:
0.3.0
- Added settings page
- Added option in settings to disable audio volume sync
- UI revamp
- Bug fixes
0.2.0
- EXPERIMENTAL: Added video selector when multiple videos in a page are detected
- Fixed bug that caused a loop when seeking
- Various fixes
